name: Isekai Madness 2: The battle against the Licht king
name_original: Isekai Madness 2: The battle against the Licht king
description:
A few weeks after their previous adventure, Lebben and Bronwyn discover information about a new evil king!

In the schoolcity of Traeth, where the youth learns about the creation of golems, there might be more mysteries than what it might look like at first sight, a man who seems to atract women likes bees to honey, a cave that turns plants into violent monsters and more! How will our heroines deal with this thread?
